author: tv
msg: Updated dependencies. This version is called 4.0-dev now.

author: tv
msg: Removed the references to the different module types from TurbineConstants
and tried to reduce the number of inter-dependencies in the module, loader
and broker-classes. This should lead to a transparent module configuration

author: ngn
msg: Allow the XML config to use the Spring beans:map element for defining ftplets

author: tv
msg: Fixed some warnings concerning synthetic accessors

author: tv
msg: Use the transparent service lookup in all service lookups
